Introduction

Yoomin is a South Korean singer under Makeumine Works. She was a member of the girl group Melody Day. She was added as the fourth member of the group in October 2014. In 2017, she and fellow members Yeoeun and Chahee, participated in KBS 2TV's idol rebooting show The Unit, and finished in 31st place. She made her solo debut on July 12, 2019 with the digital single "You Don't Know Me".
